roster.name: Gura's Gawrdians
roster.description:
Revised About Us ft new roster.

**ADMINS PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING**
If any of our transfers in are to be denied, please cancel the transfer out of Rockstar Made. I've worked out an arangement with Rockstar to let him roster ride, but I had already promised to transfer in those other players. So, the slot is his only if any of the other two are denied.

While what Rockstar did was wrong, I do not think it is fair for him to lose his medal considering his contribution to the team up to this point.

**CORE**

    De: chonk
    Me: damascus12
    FS: dryft
    CS: Shigbeard
    Ro: fuck it, we ball
    So: 45

**SUBS** in order of priority
CS/FS: shana
Medic: monkeycow182 -- i expect this person to be restricted to med
i dont really fucking know, ask chonk: box -- i expect restrictions on this person too.

**Discord Contact** for organizing anything
Shigbeard - @Shigbeard 
chonk - @bunneez
